Class AaptCommandBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simpligility.maven.plugins.android.common.AaptCommandBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AaptCommandBuilder.AaptDumpCommandBuilder, AaptCommandBuilder.AaptPackageCommandBuilder

    public class AaptCommandBuilder
extends Object
    Collates commands used to invoke Aapt.
    Author:
    Oleg Green, William Ferguson, Manfred Moser
